clauses.formation: The parties agree to form a partnership for the purpose of carrying on a lawful business.
clauses.capital_contribution: Each partner shall contribute capital as mutually agreed in writing.
clauses.profit_sharing: Profits and losses shall be shared equally unless otherwise agreed by the partners.
clauses.management: All partners shall have the right to participate in the management of the partnership.
clauses.duties: Each partner shall act in good faith and in the best interest of the partnership.
clauses.indemnity: The partnership shall indemnify partners for actions taken in the ordinary course of business.
clauses.termination: The partnership may be dissolved by mutual written consent of all partners.
clauses.governing_law: This agreement shall be governed by the laws of India.
